id: Build With Me: Monthly Planner Notion Template
name: Build With Me: Monthly Planner Notion Template
description: Welcome to our Monthly Planner Notion Template (+ Build With Me Tutorial)This is a template that we designed to teach you how to use and build Notion pages! This template will guide you through making a monthly planner with two databases. We'll also show you how to link two databases and add database templates!What's Included?Video on How to BuildPre-built Monthly Planner Notion TemplateFAQsHow to download the template?Once you make the purchase, open the template link, and click "Duplicate" on
